website_summaries.verdict: A large modern makeup mirror. Don't purchase unless you want a magnified mirror.
cons: Does not have a non-magnified mirror

customer_reviews.title: Best/Best/Best/Best/Best
customer_reviews.text: Best size -- 5.25" by 8.25", for faces Best orientation -- portrait, for faces Best magnification -- 3x, for faces Best compactness -- swings out of the way Best versatility -- tilts upward, for taller users* *Install it such that the top edge of the mirror when vertical is at the height of the shortest person in your home. All taller residents in your home can use it by tilting it upward toward their own faces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Finally a mirror that works. Magnification is perfect without showing every detail. Love that it is mounted to the wall not on my counter where space is limited. I'd like it to be more adjustable, but I highly recommend it. I'd order it again in a fast minute.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but will not fold flat against the wall
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but will not fold against the wall like you would expect and like most other mirrors like this do. It doesn’t swivel enough to lay flat against the wall. I will be returning for a round one that does.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Varnam

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is fantastic, easy to mount, and nice looking. I first tried one of these in a hotel (I travel for work constantly). I searched for it immediately upon return. I bought this one, which appears to be exactly what was in the hotel, and mounted it easily, and use it daily. Strong magnification, mounts on the wall which keeps counters clear and allows you to stand up straight without hunching over to use a mirror. Life changing for that daily shave.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, I first saw this mirror installed in a hotel room and I loved it. I could see eye brow hairs that needed plucking, make up application was easier, etc. As soon as I got home I ordered it and am very pleased with the quality of the product. I thought I would want greater magnification, but the 3X is just fine. I like the frame-less design and the rectangular shape. Thanks for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, updated, modern design
customer_reviews.text: I am using and enjoying the Hamilton Hills 3X mag wall mounted mirror. After trying and returning numerous other brands and magnifications, I ordered this one. It was very easy to mount on the wall and it is adjustable in length and width. I would have given this a 5 star rating if the mirror mounting arm allowed it to lie flush with the wall when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Carnet

customer_reviews.title: A super nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: I disregarded the reviews about whether 3X magnification was sufficient, because I didn’t plan to use magnification. Well, surprise! This isn’t a two-sided mirror, and 3X is your only choice. My fault for misunderstanding, but just be aware. Other than that, it's a really nice mirror! I thought it would replace my hand-held mirror, but it doesn’t line up right to view the back of your head. It’s great for putting ointment in my dry eyes in the dark... my main reason for getting it. We were able to attach it to the side of a 1/2” thick cabinet without any additional reinforcement. Looks like it’ll outlast our lives here on earth. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: The one arm doesn’t give enough flexiblity
customer_reviews.text: I just received the retractable mirror but unfortunately have to return it as it doesn’t work well in the space I intended it for. The product itself is very well made and I was disappointed that I had to return it. As an Interior Designer I give it a thumbs up for quality and look. The only problem is there’s not enough retractability in the product. I can’t comment on install but it looked quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for shaving in the shower
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 5X on a stand but find it just a bit strong for shaving in the shower. This one is perfect BUT the pivot on the mirror is for looking down into and in the shower I wanted to look up into it. Consequently I had to install it upside down...but hey it works! And I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is similar to ones I saw when traveling to Europe. It's compact, well made, and perfectly meets my needs. The 3x magnification works well for both my shaving and my wife's make-up application. The mirror is distortion free. Since it's not lighted, it's easy to install and requires no maintenance. It doesn't telescope, but folds flat against the wall so it doesn't interfere with the door of my medicine cabinet. The chrome parts are substantial metal, not plastic look-alike, and the mirror is glass, not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: GNS

customer_reviews.title: I love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror!!! I used one just like it during a recent luxury hotel stay; this prompted my hunt for and eventual purchase. This company's customer service is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Bahati Harden

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to vanity
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy this was to install. The little handle to adjust works great in turning the mirror. I do wish it had a higher magnification. I still have to wear my glasses to try and put on my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was easy to install and works as described. The mirror quality is excellent for the price point although I can see why some wanted a 5x magnification (vs. the 3x provided with this mirror). I'm fine with the 3x. For the people who claim the mirror won't retract flat against the wall, you either have a really defective mirror or you've installed it incorrectly (which is tough to do). Mine retracts flat with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Papadopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Great non lighted mirror
customer_reviews.text: I was staying in a hotel and they had this mirror in the bathroom - I knew right then I had to find it. As always, trusty Amazon for the win! Love this mirror. It’s easy to install. Not a fan of lighted mirrors so this one is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in my space
customer_reviews.text: These things are never easy to install. But it is absolutely perfect for its position in a basement bathroom with no room for a full-sized mirror. I have a very small round mirror and the magnifier so when guests stay all their mirror needs are covered.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzbea

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful magnifying mirror.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent magnifying mirror. I got the wall mounted version. It folds against the wall very nicely and the design is lovely. I just wish the directions would have specified what size drill bit to use for the wall anchors, but I managed to figure it out on my own.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Great- Just like the one we encountered in a hotel.
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for this mirror since we first used one in a hotel. Clear image and excellent magnification. A great make-up mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Mainer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Magnification is perfect. Installation is easy and product is quality. Fits close to the wall when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slim and attractive mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. Had one at the Marriott hotel and loved it. 3x power is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: High quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful mirror is perfect for putting on makeup (or checking out your face up close)! It magnifies x3 so your image is not distorted as with a stronger magnification. I’m not real handy so installing it was difficult but all the right necessary parts were included. I highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I waited this long to get one!
customer_reviews.text: Received the mirror quickly. It installed easily. Although the directions are a little cryptic. And it would be helpful the know how to place the mirror, what height relative to the person using it. Other than that, Its just like the one at the hotels.
customer_reviews.author: Camule

customer_reviews.title: I had the impression that the mirror could fold flat ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the impression that the mirror could fold flat against the brace if need be and thus safe space. That's the only negative. It's out there.
customer_reviews.author: daniella

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: Initially saw this mirror at a motel and fell in love with it! Extremely high quality chrome plating, very easy to install, and works great! Would recommend to anyone looking for a top end wall-mounted magnifying mirror.
customer_reviews.author: corvette1

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Makes my morning routine so much easier having everything magnified; no glasses needed. Saves me a lot of stress and time when I need it most.
customer_reviews.author: Best Seller 22

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The quality and size of the 3X mirror are excellent. It arrived well packaged and in perfect condition. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: clare nuechterlein

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wall mounted magnifying mirror
customer_reviews.text: The wall mounted magnifying mirror is exactly what I was looking for! The quality of the mirror is great, it was easy to install, and it looks sleek and professional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. I put it next to my sink and use it every morning to put on my makeup. The magnification is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Scott

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING MIRROR!!!
customer_reviews.text: My new mirror arrived in 2 days and as soon as it did my husband set it up in the bathroom...I am delighted and pleased that and more with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Lacourciere

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: cannot view your whole face too narrow for any makeup application without moving the mirror
customer_reviews.author: Edward Deuel

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Modern Look
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror. A very upscale modern look. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect magnifying mirror for me. Mounting was easy. No distortion of image.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome non lighted mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. Easy to install. Delivered quickly and was packed well. The magnification is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Moncrief

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does articulate well at all basically sticks straight out on the arm
customer_reviews.author: Thomas c

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to mount. Would be nice if the arm extended and folded.
customer_reviews.author: David Sileven

customer_reviews.title: she loved it. Arrived quickly in Brazil and perfect and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my mother, she loved it. Arrived quickly in Brazil and perfect and warm after sale service.
customer_reviews.author: Roger C C Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our small bathroom especially as it does not mist up easily. Simple to install.
customer_reviews.author: A M WATSON

customer_reviews.title: Nice item but limited by mirrors ability to articulate/move in desired directions
customer_reviews.text: Nice item, but it went from 5 stars to 3 stars because I had anticipated it being able to be moved around enough to be positioned in any fashion in my bathroom. The neck of the item rotates around its long axis, but not up and down. The mirror itself rotates half the range most other mirrors rotate, so it is very limited where and how you can position it on your wall. it couldn’t be rotated to fit on any wall available in my bathroom, so I attached it to the horizontal marble (with double sided tape) That was very disappointing. Would have purchased another item had I known.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Buzel

customer_reviews.title: Nose hairs are toast now
customer_reviews.text: Wow, nose hairs are toast now. Can see them as big as Mt Rushmore. Zap! Take that nose hair! Eyebrows escapees from Jurassic Park. Take that, eyebrows! Arm swivels left to right 180 degrees. Mirror useable vertically; not horizontally Full reveal of the hard life I’ve lived etched into face. Beat back facial hair. Treated like normal person now at Customs and cashiers.
customer_reviews.author: TalkCineman

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Poor hardware
customer_reviews.text: Product seems well made and mirror is perfect for shaving at X3 magnification. However, the hardware that comes with it is so poor that it's hardly reliable to hold the product which is not light. Had to use my own anchors. It's not a huge deal unless you don't have extra hardware around. I don't know why a company would make a good product and then include such cheap mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Robert

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous!
customer_reviews.text: Am now giving it as a House Gift when I travel to visit friends - and they rave! One couple didn't know whether they wanted it most at their summer home or their winter home. Solution? They bought another for the "other" house. DO remember, this is a first surface mirror, so use soft cloth when necessary to clean - and a gentle agent such as water with a touch of ammonia.
customer_reviews.author: Leah McL

customer_reviews.title: Mirror is good.. doesn’t fold all the way and wish ...
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is good.. doesn’t fold all the way and wish it did but won’t dock it for that since another review had warned me.. my deduction is because the it’s missing one of the chrome decorative caps to connect mirror to the plate. If I had it it would get a 5.. without it I have a mirror that moves off the wall Update: Changed to 5 stars. Company sent missing piece to me right away. Great service and great product!!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers, we enjoyed using this mirror while at a nice hotel. Our hotel was the Palace Casino in Biloxi. The occasion was Mother's day. I noticed that my wife liked the mirror and thanks to amazon prime, ours arrived and was installed 2 days later. She loves it, and that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Don Foley

customer_reviews.title: 3x's magnification is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: The finish of the steel mirror is beautiful, it is compact and yet ample to help me shave. Having remodeled the bathroom, I would have preferred a bronze-black finish but it's worth having anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: My wife saw one of these mirrors at an upscale hotel in Vegas and loved it!  Now we own one!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is really nice. Easy to install and a great value. We've been looking for a makeup mirror for the past month+ and my wife saw this mirror in Vegas at an upscale hotel. She really like it so I bought one! It lays flat against the wall and is very maneuverable. I highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking and very practical.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is very stylish. It actually looks fantastic and the 3x is just the perfect magnification. I installed this in my bathroom and use it every day when I shave. If you are looking for a long reach, this may not be the right mirror for you. I like this better than the conventional round mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Bythenumbers

customer_reviews.title: No distortion
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is the perfect magnification (3x) to use for makeup, being able to see your whole face at once, without distortion. It doesn’t have electric lighting, but I can tilt it toward my bathroom vanity lighting and the reflection is plenty bright. Sleek, modern lines, and it folds flat against the wall when not in use. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: JVP

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we used at the 4 Seasons Hotel. It is very good quality, well packaged, and obviously designed by people who know what the application is. It is well worth the price. You will be happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: baxter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mirror for men and women
customer_reviews.text: I found this in a high end Boutique Hotel bathroom, I had to have one to help with shaving. Perfect for a man or woman. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: T Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Sturdy. The mirror is flawless. Moves easily and holds its position well. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Berg

customer_reviews.title: Love the sleek design!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mirror, the sleek, modern design fits my new bathroom perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: JulieZ

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love the mirror. Very modern looking and doesn’t take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: kmaloof1059

customer_reviews.title: Check the measurements.
customer_reviews.text: This size is very deceiving. Please check the measurements before purchasing. It is automatically three times magnification it doesn’t switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like Marriott mirrors!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones in Marriott hotels. Love, love, LOVE it! Great price and really fast delivery. a++++
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Prudhomme

customer_reviews.title: Hotel mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love my mirror! It is exactly what our hotel had.
customer_reviews.author: P. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mirror ever. I can really see the tiny hairs when doing my eye brows.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C Baker

product_meta.title: 3X Magnified Premium Modern Wall Mounted Rectangular Vanity Makeup Mirror | Polished Chrome Contemporary Finish | Adjustable Arm Tilt Easy Positioning | Best Luxury Quality Magnifying Beauty Mirror
product_meta.description: Our three times magnified original design, streamlined, solid-core construction, contemporary wall mounted mirror is the perfect accessory for any bathroom, changing room, closet, or vanity. Commercial grade quality makes our mirror a favorite of 5 star hotels and luxury boutique hotels around the world. The contemporary lines are clean and sophisticated yet neutral enough to work in a variety of design aesthetics. Our adjustable swivel rectangular mirror face measures 5.25 inches wide by 8.25 inches high. The base extends 8.5" from the wall and can swivel left to right as well as a tilting face. The mirror tilts and swivels on a firm ball and socket joint with a minimalist looking adjusting bar. Turn the bar 90 degrees to use the magnified reflection in a wide format. The mirror is a perfect frameless design to mount next to your sink, dresser, or changing table.Resistant to scratches and finger prints, the polished stainless steel finish works with contemporary, traditional, transitional, deco, eclectic and shabby chic design. USA Company with 3 Generations of Family Values.
feature_bullets: SOPHISTICATED DESIGN: Luxury, contemporary, products dont need to cost a fortune. Our sleek, modern, clean line, wall mounted mirror is a beautiful statement piece. Polished shiny stainless steel, frameless design.
3 TIMES MAGNIFICATION: The slightly curved, concave, surface area is magnified three times to allow you to easily see the details while applying makeup, cosmetics, or shaving and grooming.

3 GENERATIONS OF EXCELLENCE: Our family has been manufacturing and producing mirrors for over 3 generations. We stand by the quality of our product and your experience. A family owned business with simple principles. Affordable quality in America.

EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY: We use premium materials not found in other lesser quality imitation mirrors you will see. Our mirrors are made to strict trade-secret standards and pass a rigorous 8 point inspection. Every mirror comes with our certification of authenticity.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars152 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
